rule.name: inform-responsible-persons
rule.title: Inform owners of ticket-modifications
rule.description: This rules sends a notfication to the owners of an item which, in conjunction with adi.tickets, is equal to the responsible person of an ATCTTicket.

action.property:
Hello,
ticket "${absolute_url}" you are responsible of, was modified by '${user_id}', you might want to have a look.
- - - - Automatic notification

rule.name: rule-1
rule.title: Sendmail to owners on ticket creation
rule.description: In conjunction with adi.tickets, owners equals the responsible person of an ATCTTicket.

action.property:
Hello,
item ${absolute_url} was added, and you were assigned to be the responsible person. You might want to have a look.
- - - Automatic notification
